channel.title: hugo-site on Geoscience Blog
channel.description: Recent content in hugo-site on Geoscience Blog

item.title: Exploratory Analysis and Concepts in Water Resource
Automated Reports with Parameters
item.description: ¿What is an automated report with parameters? Well, in simple terms an automated report is a document in any format (.docx, .ppt, .pdf, .html and so on) that can be update in a specific time window iteratively while is required, in the case refer to parameters, there are some variables that can be change, for example, basin, sub-basin, department, province, geological horizont, lake, etc. (espacial) and hourly, daily, monthly , etc.

item.title: Hydroapp Web Data Analysis
item.description: Hidroapp is a design system that allows you to analyze data online related to hydrochemical resources. Data The data sample is on the following link data link. The data contains the following columns: Quantitative Variables: pH Ce TDS Ca K Mg Na Cl SO4 HCO3 CO3 Qualitative Variables: Codigo (Identifier) Temporada (Seasonality) Tipo_Fuente (Water Classification) Clase_Fuente (Surface and Subterranean Classification) ratingcol claseph The quantitative variables are physico-chemical parameters, meanwhile the qualitative variables are the Codigo (Identifier), Temporada(Dry-“Estiaje” or Wet-“Avenida” season), Tipo_Fuente(Surface-“Superficial” or Subsurface-“Subterranean”), Clase_Fuente(), ratingcol-claseph (3 colors to mention if blue-basic, green-neutral or red-acid).
